info.title: Security Insights
info.description: API spec for Microsoft.SecurityInsights (Azure Security Insights) resource provider

get.description: Get geodata for a single IP address

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to enrich this ip.

get.description: Get whois information for a single domain name

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed to enrich this domain.

EnrichmentIpAddress.description: IP address (v4 or v6) to be enriched
EnrichmentIpAddress.name: ipAddress

EnrichmentDomainWhois.description: Whois information for a given domain and associated metadata

domain.description: The domain for this whois record

server.description: The hostname of this registrar's whois server

created.description: The timestamp at which this record was created

updated.description: The timestamp at which this record was last updated

expires.description: The timestamp at which this record will expire

parsedWhois.description: The whois record for a given domain

EnrichmentDomainWhoisDetails.description: The whois record for a given domain

registrar.description: The registrar associated with this domain

contacts.description: The set of contacts associated with this domain

nameServers.description: A list of name servers associated with this domain

statuses.description: The set of status flags for this whois record

EnrichmentDomainWhoisRegistrarDetails.description: The registrar associated with this domain

abuseContactPhone.description: This registrar's abuse contact phone number

ianaId.description: This registrar's Internet Assigned Numbers Authority id

whoisServer.description: The hostname of this registrar's whois server

EnrichmentDomainWhoisContacts.description: The set of contacts associated with this domain

admin.description: The admin contact for this whois record

billing.description: The billing contact for this whois record

registrant.description: The registrant contact for this whois record

tech.description: The technical contact for this whois record

EnrichmentDomainWhoisContact.description: An individual contact associated with this domain

street.description: A list describing the street address for this contact

postal.description: The postal code for this contact

phone.description: The phone number for this contact

fax.description: The fax number for this contact

email.description: The email address for this contact

EnrichmentIpGeodata.description: Geodata information for a given IP address

asn.description: The autonomous system number associated with this IP address

carrier.description: The name of the carrier for this IP address

city.description: The city this IP address is located in

cityCf.description: A numeric rating of confidence that the value in the 'city' field is correct, on a scale of 0-100

continent.description: The continent this IP address is located on

country.description: The county this IP address is located in

countryCf.description: A numeric rating of confidence that the value in the 'country' field is correct on a scale of 0-100

ipAddr.description: The dotted-decimal or colon-separated string representation of the IP address

ipRoutingType.description: A description of the connection type of this IP address

latitude.description: The latitude of this IP address

longitude.description: The longitude of this IP address

organization.description: The name of the organization for this IP address

organizationType.description: The type of the organization for this IP address

region.description: The geographic region this IP address is located in

state.description: The state this IP address is located in

stateCf.description: A numeric rating of confidence that the value in the 'state' field is correct on a scale of 0-100

stateCode.description: The abbreviated name for the state this IP address is located in
